title: Celestial Shell
summaries: The Celestial Shell is a Hardmode, post-Golem accessory that combines the stat-boosting powers of the Celestial Stone with the transformation powers of the Moon Shell, allowing both of their effects to happen simultaneously while taking only one accessory slot.

statistics.Tooltip:
Turns the holder into a werewolf at night and a merfolk when entering water
Minor increase to damage, melee speed, critical strike chance,
life regeneration, defense, mining speed, and minion knockback
